page.title: 15Salehurst C.E Primary School
page.content: { {Local History. }This Church of England school was established in 1790 and consisted of two classrooms in the main building.Four other classrooms are housed in pre-fabricated buildings which were erected in 1949.Until the comprehensive was built in 1955 most children were educated here until the age of fifteen years. {Education.}The school has two junior classes,two infant classes and one class for special education.Children are admitted at 4 1/2 years.They transfer to the senior school at the age of eleven.In addition to the basic curriculum a one year French course, swimming,violin and recorder lessons are offered to the children.
